Package com.syncura360.service

Class EquipmentService

java.lang.Object
com.syncura360.service.EquipmentService
@Service public class EquipmentService extends Object
Service class responsible for managing equipment in a hospital room.
Author:
Darsh-KP

  • Constructor Details

    • EquipmentService

      public EquipmentService(EquipmentRepository equipmentRepository)

      Parameters:
      equipmentRepository - The repository used for equipment operations.

  • Method Details

    • setEquipmentsForRoom

      public void setEquipmentsForRoom(int hospitalId, String roomName, List<EquipmentUpdateDTO> equipments)
      Sets the equipment for a specific room in the hospital. If the equipment list is empty or null, it deletes the existing equipment in the room. Otherwise, it updates the room's equipment.
      Parameters:
      hospitalId - The ID of the hospital.
      roomName - The name of the room to set equipment for.
      equipments - The list of equipment to be set in the room.

    • deleteEquipmentsForRoom

      public void deleteEquipmentsForRoom(Integer hospitalId, String roomName)
      Deletes all equipment in a specific room for a given hospital.
      Parameters:
      hospitalId - The ID of the hospital.
      roomName - The name of the room to delete the equipment from.
